Temperature¶

Blaney-Criddle (1950)¶

\[PET=kp(0.46 * T_a + 8.13)\]

Hamon (1961)¶

\[PET = (\frac{DL}{12})^2 exp(\frac{T_a}{16})\]

Romanenko (1961)¶

\[PET=4.5(1 + (\frac{T_a}{25})^2 (1 \frac{e_a}{e_s})\]

Linacre (1977)¶

\[PET = \frac{\frac{500 T_m}{(100-A)}+15 (T_a-T_d)}{80-T_a}\]
\[T_m = T_a + 0.006 * elevation\]
